sections.instructions: Attempt any TEN part questions in all. All part questions carry equal marks. Answer should not exceed 6 to 7 lines.

questions.question: Why is C language called 'case sensitive language'?
What will be the output of the following program segment? For(i = 1; i<5; i++) if (i == 3) continue; else printf('%d', i);
What is a function? What are the advantages of using a function?
Define any one of the following: a) DBMS b) Data dictionary
Write a program that generates the following output: (use any loop) 2 4 3 6 4 8 5 10
Write a program that prints the factorial of given number.
What are keywords in C language? Define only three.
What are Escape sequences? Write the purpose of any three.
Define: a) Table b) Query
What is data redundancy?
Define increment operator and decrement operator. Give example of each operator.
What is the difference between a primary key and a secondary key?
Write equivalent C statement: a) x = (b² - c²)/2bc b) (x + y)ⁿ c) b = √(x + y + z²)
Define scanf() with its syntax
Differentiate between Actual Parameter and Formal Parameters.

sections.instructions: Attempt any TWO question from this section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: Explain arithmetic, relational and logical operators used in C.
Define switch statement. Also write an example program of switch statement.
Explain different types of database models.
